author: Simon Difford
description: This refreshing vodka-based strawberry cocktail balances tart lemon juice with rich honey. Drops of balsamic and a dusting of black pepper add complexity.
name: Strawberry Fields
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE strawberry in base of shaker
Add vodka, honey syrup, lemon juice and egg white and SHAKE with ice
Strain back into shaker, DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass
